Package org.activity.clustering.weka

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Clustering  
    Controller
    Used for Debugging purposes
    DataLoader
    Loads a CSV file by converting it into arff file and if class index is absent then last attribute is set as class index
    EMClustering  
    KMeans  
    SimpleEMOriginalGunjan  
    SplitTrainingTestUsersBalanced
    Splits the set of users into training and test set based on the class label (based on best matching-unit) assigned to them.
    TimelineWEKAClusteringController
    For clustering or classification of users based on attributes extracted from their timelines
    WekaUtilityBelt  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    WekaUtilityBelt.ClustersRangeScheme
    Clustering0: 0-1, 2-5, 6-inf (original, in Dec2015 paper draft, ManualClustering2);
    Clustering1: 0, 1-3, 4-inf ;
    Clustering2: 0-1, 2-4, 5-inf
